channel.title: How to make an Invincibility Potion
channel.description: Okay, I know how to make the invincibility work, I just don't know how to give item's actions. So, I don't know how to make it so that if you drink a Saradomin Brew it has 1 less dose and it makes the invincibility timer go true. Help please. Thanks :)

item.title: How to make an Invincibility Potion
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Thanks, I can take it from here. Rep++

EDIT: DANGIT ALREADY REPPED YOU TODAY… lol

Read full topic
item.source: How to make an Invincibility Potion

item.title: How to make an Invincibility Potion
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

the code for when you click stuff is under this

public boolean CheckForSkillUse3(int Item, int Slot) { boolean GoOn = true; switch (Item) {

and to make it check if you pressed items add them as case under that… like this that i have done

case 3801: { if (drunkTimer > 90000) { sendMessage("You Are Already So Drunk You Can't Take Anything More"); } else { sendMessage("You begin To Feel Drunk"); drunkTimer += 240; deleteItem(3801, getItemSlot(3801), 1); startAnimation(1329); } } break;

that is if you press item 3801… i think you can figure out the rest of the stuff… i think i can do that potion if i feel for it…

Read full topic
item.source: How to make an Invincibility Potion
